attributes.action: Shut Schools Down Due To CoronaVirus Outbreak
attributes.additional_details: We want the government to take actions upon this, as we don’t want the fellow virus to be able to spread easier from students to teachers which proceed upon families. Furthermore, having students beyond home will still be able to have set work and be corona free by no public gathering, which may lead to stalling the increases of the spread.
attributes.background: We want schools to be shut down for temporarily time, due to the local public government of transport easier to spread corona virus, people such as visitors are occurring it from difference countries also.
